## Quick Start

### To Create GitHub Issues
1. Open https://github.com/product-on-purpose/pm-skills/issues/new
2. Use content from `.github/issues-drafts/[NUMBER]-[REPO].md`
3. Copy title from frontmatter
4. Copy body content
5. Apply labels from frontmatter
6. Update TRACKER.md with issue number

## Key Messaging by Audience Type

### Claude Skills Lists (01-04)
**Positioning:** Comprehensive skill collection, not single-purpose  
**Emphasize:** 24 skills, workflow bundles, Agent Skills Spec compliance  
**Keywords:** "production-ready", "complete PM framework", "workflow automation"

### Product Management Lists (05-08)
**Positioning:** Practical PM resource with AI enhancement  
**Emphasize:** Proven frameworks (Triple Diamond, JTBD, OST), instant usability  
**Keywords:** "AI-powered PM workflows", "professional frameworks", "practical utility"

### AI/LLM Lists (09-15)
**Positioning:** Agent-ready workflows, systematic LLM patterns  
**Emphasize:** Structured processes, repeatable execution, framework-based quality  
**Keywords:** "agent-ready", "systematic workflows", "structured LLM integration"

### Productivity Lists (17)
**Positioning:** Efficiency multiplier for product teams  
**Emphasize:** Time savings (hours ‚Üí minutes), workflow automation  
**Keywords:** "productivity system", "AI-powered efficiency", "professional quality"

## Common Submission Mistakes to Avoid

‚ùå **Generic pitch** - "Check out this cool PM tool!"  
‚úÖ **Tailored value** - "Perfect fit for your 'Collaboration & PM' section - 24 systematic workflows"

‚ùå **Missing context** - Just dropping a link  
‚úÖ **Clear positioning** - Explain HOW it fits and WHICH section

‚ùå **Wrong audience** - Submitting to misaligned lists  
‚úÖ **Research first** - Confirm scope and existing entries

‚ùå **Ignoring guidelines** - Not following their format  
‚úÖ **Match their style** - Review existing entries first

## Success Metrics

Track in TRACKER.md:
- Submissions made
- PRs merged
- PRs rejected (with reasons)
- Traffic/stars impact (if measurable)
